verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It is so easy to say
The words we utter everyday.
Making promises here and then,
Never had the will to keep it in.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The vows we made evertime we're moved,
Unspoken words when the preacher stood.
In the altar, there our tears were born;
Hearts were broken and completely torn.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Emotions are swayed and prayers were made,
Hot as a coal once commitments were laid.
Knees were bent, face flat on the floor.,
Then we start with a fervent spirit on our door.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
As time passes by, we slowly turn away
From that on time altar experience we forgert to obey.
Adversity and discouragements had shaken our coast,
And we fall back from the things, Oh completely lost!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
We then realized how hard it is for us,
To stick to our words, to endure and to last.
So quickly we tell that we can fulfill and stay
And then we excuse ourselves with made-up balconey.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Wake up! It is not yet too late,
Do not wallow in your pride or sulk in hate.
For though we fail over and over again,
There's always a second chance for us to win

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
A commitment is not going to be cakewalk.
It's how you do things; not on how you talk.
Even though it is conceived out of emotions,
Yet it can only be detemined through out actions.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
So make amends to God for the things that are undone.
Reconstruct your vows and fulfill them one by one.
Only then miracles start to happen,
For God blesses those who stayed till the end.
